70 seventy & 80 eighty & 90 ninety & 100 one(a) hundred & 101 one hundred and one\\

3. 序数词：表示顺序的数词。

\begin{tabular}{|l|l|l|l|}  
$1^{st}$ first & $9^{th}$ ninth & $17^{th}$ seventeenth & $21^{st}$ twenty-first \\  
$2^{nd}$ second & $10^{th}$ tenth & $18^{th}$ eighteenth & $22^{nd}$ twenty-second \\  
$3^{rd}$ third & $11^{th}$ eleventh & $19^{th}$ nineteenth & $23^{rd}$ twenty-third \\  
$4^{th}$ fourth & $12^{th}$ twelfth & $20^{th}$ twentieth & $35^{th}$ thirty-fifth \\  
$5^{th}$ fifth & $13^{th}$ thirteenth & $30^{th}$ thirtieth & $101^{st}$ one hundred \\  
$6^{th}$ sixth & $14^{th}$ fourteenth & $80^{th}$ eightieth & and first \\  
$7^{th}$ seventh & $15^{th}$ fifteenth & $90^{th}$ ninetieth & \\  
$8^{th}$ eighth & $16^{th}$ sixteenth & $100^{th}$ one hundredth & \\  
\end{tabular}


# 4. 数词的用法:

1)  表示年份：2002：twenty thousand and two;1976：nineteen seventy-six.
2) 表示日期：12目1日：Dec.1st 成 the first of December;
2002年11月8日：Nov. 8th .2002.
3) 表示时刻：5:15→five fifteen 或 a quarter past five；
8：30→eight thirty 或 a half past eight;
10:45→ten forty-five 或 a quarter to eleven.
4) 表示偏号：Room 105 -> Room one O five ; Bus No.13 → Bus Number Thirteen;
P.5→Page Five ; Tel . No. 7658659→Telephone Number seven -sixfive - eight - six - five - nine.
5) 小数的读法:5.7→five point seven ; 0.16→ zero point one six
6) “半”的表达：1/2→> half ;半小时→ half an hour ; 1.5小时→ one and a half hours 或 one hour and a half.
7) 序数词前面加 the 时，表示顺序，加 a / an 时表示“再一、又一”。如：The third lesson is rather difficult.（第三课相当难）/ Shall we read the text a third time？(我们把课文读第三遍，好吗？)
